news.headline: Revolution Concrete Mixers adds Atlantic Heavy Duty as Authorized Service Provider in East Coast, with locations in PA and NC.
news.summary: Revolution Concrete Mixers has expanded its Authorized Service Provider Network by partnering with Atlantic Heavy Duty, aiming to deliver outstanding service to customers in the Mid-Atlantic and Southeastern United States. Atlantic Heavy Duty will operate from locations in Morgantown, PA, and Fayetteville, NC, strategically placed to cover the East Coast. This move underscores Revolution Concrete Mixers' dedication to offering top-notch support and service, catering to a wider customer base with a focus on strategic expansion.

news.headline: New Mountain invests over $400M in 7 net lease deals in 2024, acquiring 43 properties in 23 states totaling 3M sq ft.
news.summary: New Mountain Capital, LLC, a prominent alternative investment firm based in New York, has revealed that it invested over $400 million in seven net lease deals in 2024. These transactions involved purchasing 43 properties spanning 23 states, totaling over 3 million square feet. The average lease period for these assets is around 17 years. The properties acquired are vital to a diverse range of operations.

news.headline: Barco showcases newest innovations for Teams BYOD experience with automatic peripheral selection and speaker attribution.
news.summary: Barco, a prominent player in meeting room technology based in Belgium, has unveiled its latest advancements in the Teams Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) experience, all supported by ClickShare. Notable enhancements encompass automatic peripheral selection and speaker attribution, guaranteeing a tailored and seamless encounter for participants in BYOD spaces. Barco, in collaboration with Microsoft, is dedicated to crafting an unparalleled meeting experience with an uncomplicated and enhanced user journey. Microsoft’s most recent collaborations further solidify the company's commitment to revolutionizing collaboration with cutting-edge technology.

news.headline: ExchangeRight's Essential Income REIT excels in latest report, only NTR to achieve top grades in all performance categories for Q3 2024.
news.summary: In Pasadena, California, ExchangeRight has revealed that the Essential Income REIT has achieved a notable milestone by being the sole growth or stabilizing equity non-traded REIT ("NTR") to receive the highest grade in all three performance categories in Blue Vault's non-traded REIT Industry Review for Q3 2024. The REIT excelled in the "Operating Performance," "Financing Outlook," and "Cumulative MFFO Payout" categories for two consecutive quarters. Notably, among its comparison class, the Essential Income REIT experienced a growth in N.

news.headline: Outdoor living trends are transforming backyards w/ luxe elements, sustainability & personalized design; evolving from a pandemic escape to private oases.
news.summary: In Winchester, Va., a growing trend in outdoor living for the new year is transforming the way people utilize and appreciate their backyards. This trend combines innovative design, customized features, and eco-friendly options. Initially sparked by the pandemic as a practical retreat, it has now shifted towards the creation of exclusive outdoor retreats that match the extravagance of indoor areas. Homeowners are now focusing on incorporating daring, creative, and cozy elements into their outdoor spaces, going beyond just a simple patio and grill. This approach represents a shift towards a lifestyle that emphasizes outdoor comfort and luxury.

news.headline: Development Ventures Group aims to expand student housing business in the U.S., featured in Student Housing Business magazine.
news.summary: A company, Development Ventures Group, based in Orlando, Florida, is set to significantly grow its student housing business in the United States. This information was disclosed in a feature story by Student Housing Business.

news.headline: Dwight Capital and Dwight Mortgage Trust finance over $2 billion in 2024 across 33 states, expanding capital solutions.
news.summary: In Miami, Dwight Capital and its affiliated REIT, Dwight Mortgage Trust (DMT), successfully concluded the year 2024 by completing real estate financings exceeding $2 billion in 33 states. The servicing portfolio of Dwight & Co. expanded to surpass $12 billion, coinciding with the celebration of its eleventh year in operation. Through the introduction of multiple new lending platforms, including Dwight Healthcare Funding initiated in January 2024, the company now provides skilled nursing home operators access to working capital revolving lines of credit in addition to Dwight's bridge loans.

news.headline: Senior US Administration Official: Trump and Israel's Netanyahu will discuss maintaining ceasefire deals and commitment to freeing hostages held by Hamas.
Avantik partners with Service Specialists of America to expand national service network. Pine Brook, NJ, Feb. 4, 2025.
news.summary: A diagnostic laboratory solutions provider based in PINE BROOK, N.J., Avantik, shared news on Feb. 4, 2025, that it has expanded its national service network. Avantik, known for its products and service solutions aiding diagnostic laboratories, has partnered with Service XYZ to enhance its offerings. This collaboration aims to benefit Avantik's operations and amplify its services across the United States. This move reflects Avantik's commitment to enhancing its reach in the industry and ensuring top-notch support for diagnostic laboratories nationwide.

news.headline: Banfield to increase annual investment by up to $8M to support veterinarians and nearly double investment in student debt relief, total investment sitting at $31M+.
news.summary: A leading general veterinary practice in the nation has expanded its benefits with an additional investment of over $31 million to aid its veterinarians in managing student debt. The practice, based in Vancouver, Washington, announced this move on February 4, 2025, as a continuation of its dedication to supporting the wellbeing of its Associates.

news.headline: WazirX warns creditors: Accept the approved restructuring plan or face repayments delayed until 2030.
news.summary: WazirX has cautioned creditors about potential delays in repayments until the year 2030 in the event of rejecting its restructuring scheme. The plan, which has been authorized by the Singapore High Court, aims to address the company's financial situation and facilitate the repayment process. It is advised for creditors to consider this approved restructuring plan as a means to expedite the repayment process in a timely manner.

news.headline: Syncro appoints Peter Gyenes as Chairman to boost support for MSPs and IT Teams in Tampa, Florida.
news.summary: Peter Gyenes, an experienced tech leader, has been appointed as Chairman of Syncro to enhance support for MSPs and IT Teams based in Tampa, Florida.

news.headline: BorgWarner ranked 6th in automotive on Corporate Knights' 2025 Global 100, assessing companies with 25 key indicators.
news.summary: This is the inaugural occasion BorgWarner has been honored in this way, securing the sixth position in the automotive sector. Notably, they are the sole automotive supplier to be featured in the Global 100. The assessment was conducted on publicly traded companies exceeding $1 billion in revenue, evaluating their performance on 25 crucial indicators spanning environmental, social, and...

news.headline: DoiT acquires PerfectScale for Kubernetes optimization, enhancing cloud capabilities for managing containerized workloads.
news.summary: A prominent cloud optimization company, DoiT, based in Santa Clara, California, has recently acquired PerfectScale, an automated Kubernetes optimization and governance platform. This strategic acquisition enables DoiT to enhance their services by providing customers with the ability to effectively manage, secure, and optimize containerized workloads operating on Kubernetes. Through this acquisition, DoiT aims to offer greater efficiency and resilience at scale to its clients. This move is a part of DoiT's ongoing commitment to empowering businesses with enhanced cloud solutions.

news.headline: Keebler introduces limited-edition Harry Potter Butterbeer Fudge Stripes cookies in partnership with Warner Bros. Discovery.
news.summary: In a recent collaboration, Ernie and his team of elves have introduced a new limited-edition Butterbeer cookie. The popular flavor inspired by the iconic drink from the Harry Potter series is brought to life by Keebler® in partnership with Warner Bros. Discovery Global Consumer Products. The cookies are set to hit shelves starting from February 4, 2025. Fans are excited to indulge in this delicious treat during the Butterbeer season, with anticipation for the release building up. This move is expected to garner significant attention from both Harry Potter enthusiasts and cookie aficionados alike, as they look forward to experiencing the magical taste of Butterbeer in the form of a delightful cookie.

news.headline: TNS 2025 Robocall Report: Top US carriers signed 86% of all traffic, protecting subscribers from unwanted calls.
news.summary: In Reston, Virginia, major US telecom companies including Verizon, UScellular, T-Mobile, Lumen, Comcast, Charter, and AT&T are successfully implementing STIR/SHAKEN technology as reported by Transaction Network Services (TNS) 2025 Robocall Investigation Report. The report released today highlights that 86% of all communications exchanged among these top carriers were authenticated throughout the year. This effort has significantly contributed to shielding their customers from unwanted robocalls. Additionally, 95% of calls...

news.headline: ex/ante launches Builder Blueprints resource funded by Ford Foundation to enhance tech startups' user and company protection.
news.summary: A venture fund named ex/ante, based in New York, has introduced Builder Blueprints, a unique resource aimed at assisting startup founders in prioritizing user protection when developing technology. The fund specifically targets investing in technology that promotes human agency and user control over privacy, data, assets, and algorithms. Builder Blueprints is a free tool created to help founders establish top-tier companies while focusing on user safeguards. This initiative received backing from the Ford Foundation Mission Investments initiative. Startup founders are encouraged to utilize this innovative resource to ensure user protection in their business operations.

news.headline: Study shows fewer cases of necrotizing enterocolitis in premature infants after exclusive human milk diet, saving costs.
news.summary: New findings support the use of 100% human milk-based nutrition for very low birth weight infants. A recent independent study revealed a decrease in cases of the dangerous intestinal disease in these babies. Published in Advances in Neonatal Care, the research adds to the mounting evidence of the benefits of this feeding approach. The study was conducted in DUARTE, Calif., and news of this development was released on Feb. 4, 2025.

news.headline: Future Capital and Axos Clearing team up to offer 401(k) management for financial advisors in Chattanooga, Tenn.
news.summary: A partnership between Future Capital and Axos Clearing based in Chattanooga, Tennessee, has been established to provide 401(k) management services for financial advisors. This collaboration aims to streamline the management process for advisors, allowing them to better serve their clients.

news.headline: PeachSkinSheets donates six figures to aid LA fire victims, providing comfort and support. Retail value over $103,000.
news.summary: A substantial donation in the six-figure range has been made by PeachSkinSheets to offer relief and assistance to individuals impacted by the recent Los Angeles fires. Valued at over $103,000, this generous contribution aims to bring comfort and support to displaced Angelenos. The announcement was made in Atlanta on February 4, 2025.

news.headline: Thryv will release its Q4 and full year 2024 financial results on Feb 27 before market opens, with a conference call at 8:30am ET.
news.summary: Dallas-based Thryv® Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: THRY), a prominent supplier of sales and marketing software for small businesses, disclosed plans to unveil its financial performance for the fourth quarter and full year of 2024 on February 27. The results are scheduled to be made public before the market opens on that day, followed by a conference call at 8:30 a.m. ET for discussions with investors. Interested parties can register for the conference call using the provided link or by visiting Thryv’s website.

news.headline: NVISIONx has released Nx+RexAI, a new data security management solution in Los Angeles to address data governance and compliance issues.
news.summary: A new solution has been introduced by NVISIONx in Los Angeles to address current data governance, regulatory compliance, and data security challenges. This launch aims to provide enhanced tools to combat these issues effectively.

news.headline: Aerotek wins Best of Staffing Client and Talent 10-Year Diamond Awards for service excellence after a decade.
news.summary: A leading workplace solutions provider, Aerotek, was recently honored with the prestigious Best of Staffing Client and Talent 10-Year Diamond Awards for their exceptional service. The recognition was received in Hanover, Maryland on February 4, 2025. Aerotek specializes in offering services for various industries such as manufacturing, logistics, construction, aviation, facilities, and maintenance.

news.headline: Mitiga, a Cloud Detection and Response company, appoints Charlie Thomas as CEO to drive growth.
news.summary: A company based in New York, Mitiga, which specializes in Cloud Detection and Response, has recently named Charlie Thomas as its new CEO.

news.headline: Outlook Therapeutics discusses 12-week results for NORSE EIGHT trial in virtual investor segment.
news.summary: Dr. Jennifer Kissner, Senior Vice President of Clinical Development, provided insights on the safety and effectiveness data from the NORSE EIGHT clinical trial, covering a span of 12 weeks.

news.headline: Verizon offers new promo for mobile and home customers, featuring Google One AI Premium services.
FlyJetr is catering to first-time private jet travelers with unmatched access and convenience, leading a transformative shift in the industry.
news.summary: Young travelers are increasingly choosing FlyJetr for unparalleled access and convenience in luxury jet charter services. The company, based in Miami, is setting new standards in the private aviation sector by attracting a significant number of first-time flyers. This transformative trend is evident in the sharp increase in bookings, with an impressive 30% rise over the past year. FlyJetr is redefining the travel experience for these young customers, offering them a class above the rest in terms of comfort and flexibility.

news.headline: Mural appoints Bill Dwoinen as Chief Revenue Officer to accelerate global growth, announced on Feb. 4, 2025.
news.summary: Mural, a visual work platform facilitating teamwork, has enhanced its executive leadership by appointing Bill Dwoinen as the new Chief Revenue Officer (CRO), in San Francisco on February 4, 2025. The platform aims to boost global expansion efforts by leveraging Dwoinen's expertise.

news.headline: OceanSound promotes 3, hires 8 in tech investments, managing $4.4B in assets, invested in 10 platforms.
news.summary: OceanSound Partners, a private equity firm focusing on technology and technology-enabled services for government and regulated markets, revealed the promotion of three individuals and the addition of eight new members across its investment, portfolio ownership, and operations teams in New York. Currently overseeing more than $4.4 billion in Regulatory Assets Under Management, OceanSound has made investments in ten platform companies.

news.headline: BioFlyte gets SBIR Phase I contract from U.S. Air Force to advance aerosol Chem/Biothreat tech for critical infrastructure.
news.summary: A company based in Albuquerque, New Mexico, BioFlyte, has recently secured a Phase I contract from AFWERX Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR). The contract is specifically aimed at their BioTOF z200 project.

news.headline: Nature's Path introduces Love Crunch Protein Granola with two new varieties, adding protein to indulgent flavors - U.S. launch. #OrganicFood #Snacks #ProteinGranola
news.summary: A popular organic food brand has unveiled two new granola flavors that combine rich taste with protein-packed nutrition for on-the-go snacking. Nature's Path, the biggest organic breakfast and snack food producer in North America, revealed the release of the products. The announcement was made in Vancouver, BC on February 4, 2025.

news.headline: Lennox and Samsung partner to launch new mini-split and VRF product lineups, combining expertise in HVAC technology.
news.summary: Dallas, February 4, 2025 - Lennox, a renowned company in providing climate control solutions for residential and commercial use, along with Samsung, a globally recognized leader in HVAC technology, have joined forces to create ductless heating and cooling solutions. The collaboration combines the expertise and reputation of both brands to offer efficient climate control options. The partnership between Lennox and Samsung aims to provide customers with top-notch products that cater to their heating and cooling needs.

news.headline: SimpliSafe® receives AVS-01 certification from UL, the third in industry. Improving emergency response. BOSTON, Feb. 4, 2025.
news.summary: SimpliSafe has recently earned its third Underwriters Laboratories (UL) certification following the release of the Standard, making it one of only three security organizations to achieve this milestone. This certification showcases SimpliSafe's dedication to public safety and operational quality. The accomplishment was announced in Boston on February 4, 2025, as reported by PRNewswire. This achievement highlights SimpliSafe's commitment to adhering to the highest standards and ensuring its products meet strict safety protocols.

news.headline: New firm LuxMed Transition Strategies, backed by Professional Transition Strategies, meets demand for practice transitions in medical aesthetics and wellness. Industry-leading expertise offered in the aesthetic and wellness practice market.
news.summary: LuxMed Transition Strategies, a leading firm in practice transitions for medical aesthetics, has partnered with Professional Transition Strategies to bring top-notch expertise to the aesthetic and wellness practice market. This collaboration was announced in Dallas on February 4, 2025. LuxMed aims to offer industry-leading services in this sector, ensuring seamless transitions for their clients.

news.headline: PayPal beats revenue and EPS estimates in Q4, with $8.37 billion revenue and $1.19 EPS. $15 billion buyback announced.
news.summary: PayPal Holdings Inc (NASDAQ: PYPL) saw a 4% growth in their fiscal fourth-quarter revenue, reaching $8.37 billion, surpassing the analyst consensus of $8.26 billion. The company also reported an adjusted EPS of $1.19, higher than the expected $1.12. Despite the positive results, the stock declined post announcement. Total payment volumes rose by 7% year-over-year, reaching $437.8 billion for the quarter. However, payment transactions decreased by 3% to $6.6 billion. This data comes in the midst of global interest in AI, with Sam Altman from OpenAI looking towards collaborating with major companies like Samsung, SK Hynix, and SoftBank. For more details, the full story is available on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: Dubai seeks $500 million from construction firm IPO.
Supernus Pharmaceuticals received FDA approval for ONAPGO™ for Parkinson's Disease, available in Q2 2025 with nurse education support.
news.summary: In Rockville, Maryland, on February 4, 2025, Supernus Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (Nasdaq: SUPN), a biopharmaceutical company specializing in treatments for central nervous system disorders, shared that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has granted approval for ONAPGO (apomorphine hydrochloride) injection, previously identified as SPN-830. This marks it as the pioneering subcutaneous apomorphine infusion device sanctioned for managing motor fluctuations in adults afflicted with advanced Parkinson’s disease (PD). ONAPGO is set to be released in the second quarter of 2025 along with a dedicated team of experts, which includes an extensive nurse education initiative and launch-time support services.

news.headline: Roadzen reduces $5.5m short-term liabilities by paying $1.65m in cash & $12.6m in 6 months using cash & shares.
news.summary: In the past six months, Roadzen successfully cleared $12.6 million in short-term liabilities. This was achieved by using $1.65 million in cash and issuing around 1.2 million ordinary shares valued at $2.80 per share.

news.headline: Kenco's survey on Supply Chain Innovation reveals varying views on AI's impact in shaping 2025 strategies.
news.summary: In Chattanooga, Tennessee, Kenco, a top third-party logistics provider, has unveiled the findings of its 2025 Supply Chain Innovation report.

news.headline: Clover supports Superdome and small businesses in New Orleans during Big Game, powering pay and delighting fans.
news.summary: Milwaukee – The prominent all-in-one point-of-sale solution, Clover, is fully embracing the "small" aspect during the most significant week in football. As the Big Game approaches in New Orleans, a hub for food and culture, tens of thousands of fans and tourists are expected to gather. Clover will play a substantial role in supporting the Superdome and small businesses during this event, facilitating transactions for fans, boosting enthusiasm, and enhancing the overall experience for attendees. This initiative highlights Clover's commitment to empowering small businesses and maximizing the potential of the event as it converges on New Orleans.

news.headline: Highnote partners with Fasten Rewards for new consumer credit card program, rewarding auto loan/lease payments.
news.summary: In San Francisco, Highnote, a prominent modern card platform manager, revealed the introduction of a fresh consumer credit card initiative in collaboration with Fasten Rewards. Through utilizing Highnote’s adaptable platform, Fasten is striving to enhance the connection between drivers and dealerships by offering a unique credit card program. This program rewards consumers for auto loan or lease payments, simultaneously boosting dealership loyalty, engagement, and sales velocity. The consumer revolving credit program is designed to cater to the needs of both parties, ultimately fostering stronger relationships within the automotive industry.

news.headline: Zuora named leader in recurring billing solutions in Forrester report; highest score in Revenue Recognition.
news.summary: In Redwood City, California, Zuora, Inc. (NYSE: ZUO) has been recognized as a Leader in The Forrester Wave™: Recurring Billing Solutions, Q1 2025. They achieved the highest score in the Revenue Recognition category according to the report. The report highlighted Zuora's aggressive product vision and strategy focusing on providing integrated solutions to enhance subscriber experience and revenue management.

news.headline: Bounty returns to Radio Row at Super Bowl LIX with House of Wingman serving tens of thousands of chicken wings.
news.summary: Bounty Paper Towels is set to make a splash at Super Bowl LIX with the return of the House of Wingman event in New Orleans. Taking place from February 3 to 7, 2025, at the Earnest N. Morial Convention Center, the event will feature tens of thousands of chicken wings to cater to reporters on Radio Row. The iconic NFL duos will also be in attendance to add to the excitement. The event showcases the idea that football and wings go hand-in-hand.

news.headline: Olo partners with FreedomPay and Stripe to enhance in-store payments for restaurants. Collaboration to accelerate adoption.
news.summary: A prominent restaurant technology provider, Olo (NYSE:OLO), recently disclosed a strategic collaboration with FreedomPay to enhance restaurant payment experiences across the country. This partnership serves to strengthen Olo's ties with Stripe, a financial infrastructure platform, enabling in-person transaction processing. Olo Pay, introduced in 2022 with Stripe as its initial digital payments partner, signifies a significant advancement in the realm of restaurant payment solutions.

news.headline: Nitrogen appoints Rachel Cameron as Managing Director of Partnerships, known for her work at SS&C Black Diamond & DPL Financial.
news.summary: In Auburn, California, Nitrogen (formerly Riskalyze), a prominent developer of software for advisors in risk tolerance, proposal generation, investment research, and planning, named Rachel Cameron as the new head of partnerships. Cameron, with a background in partner strategy within financial technology, has held key positions at SS&C Black Diamond Wealth Platform and DPL Financial Partners. Notable for her contribution, she will oversee partnerships in her new role.

news.headline: Victor Capital Partners invests in B-O-F Corporation to drive growth and innovation in retail sectors, focusing on unique beverage and specialty shelving offerings.
news.summary: A prominent middle market private equity firm, Victor Capital Partners, has revealed their recent investment in B-O-F Corporation, a company in the industrial technology sector. In collaboration with senior management, Victor Capital will be supporting B-O-F in providing specialized beverage and shelving solutions to various retailers like grocery stores, convenience stores, and mass merchants. This move signifies Victor Capital's strategic focus on partnering with branded businesses, emphasizing their commitment to sectors such as industrial technology, specialty consumer goods, and business services.

news.headline: S&S Activewear invests in Canadian division with new structure and leadership appointments, effective Feb 1, 2025. Craig Ryan appointed as VP of commercial.
news.summary: S&S Activewear, a prominent distributor of apparel and accessories in North America, is strengthening its presence in Canada by making substantial investments in its Canadian division. They have recently unveiled a new commercial structure and key leadership appointments, set to take effect on Feb. 1, 2025. In order to boost growth and improve customer assistance, Craig Ryan will assume the role of vice president of commercial operations. This move demonstrates S&S Activewear's dedication to the Canadian market.

news.headline: Motorsport Games Inc. (NASDAQ: MSGM) releases preliminary 2024 results and business updates.
news.summary: Miami, on February 4th, 2025 - A prominent racing game developer and publisher, Motorsport Games Inc. (NASDAQ: MSGM), declared various updates regarding its operations, finances, and overall business.

news.headline: Collaboration between STMicroelectronics and HighTec EDV-Systeme aims to enhance software-defined vehicles' safety.
news.summary: In the latest report, it was revealed that the unemployment rate had dropped to 4%, the lowest in a decade. The economy added 250,000 jobs in the past month, surpassing expectations. The stock market also saw a significant increase, with the main indexes rising by 3% on average. Additionally, inflation remained steady at 2%, providing further stability to the economy. Experts are optimistic about the future outlook, citing the strong performance as a sign of continued growth. Overall, the economic indicators point towards a positive trend in the coming months.

news.headline: Femasys gets Israeli regulatory approvals for FemaSeed female infertility treatment and two diagnostic devices.
news.summary: Following the announcement of FemaSeed's U.S. FDA clearance in September 2023 and EU CE mark approval in June 2024, the regulatory approval process has been completed. The U.S. FDA clearance of FemaSeed was announced in September 2023, and the EU CE mark approval was announced in June 2024.
